subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The American Bernard Lagat, who ran for Kenya in 2004, enters the Olympics as the favorite in the 1,500 meters, but he appears somewhat less invincible than he once did.
snippet: The American Bernard Lagat, who ran for Kenya in 2004, enters the Olympics as the favorite in the 1,500 meters, but he appears somewhat less invincible than he once did.
